title: Bread and the Land by Jeffery Renard Allen

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Allen uses literary elements and techniques to convey Hatch’s complex relationship with his grandmother.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Allen uses literary elements and techniques to convey Hatch’s complex relationship with his grandmother.

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
